alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 2:28PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Butte and western Meade Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 228 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of Bear Butte State Park, or 12 miles east of Sturgis, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Vale around 245 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Owl Butte and Newell Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Meade Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
